content:
I see the issue now. We can't craft a burner mining drill directly because we need iron plates first, and those need to be smelted in a furnace. Let's focus on using what we have to get iron plates:

```python
# First check our inventory
inventory = inspect_inventory()
print(f"Current inventory: {inventory}")

# Find iron ore patch
iron_pos = nearest(Resource.IronOre)
print(f"Found iron ore at {iron_pos}")

# Move closer to iron ore
safe_pos = Position(x=iron_pos.x + 2, y=iron_pos.y)
move_to(safe_pos)
print(f"Moved closer to iron ore at {safe_pos}")

# Manually mine some iron ore
harvest_resource(iron_pos, quantity=10)
print("Harvested iron ore")

# Find a good spot for our furnace
furnace_pos = Position(x=safe_pos.x + 2, y=safe_pos.y)
move_to(furnace_pos)
print(f"Moved to furnace position at {furnace_pos}")

# Place the furnace
furnace = place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=furnace_pos)
print(f"Placed furnace at {furnace.position}")

# Add fuel to furnace
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace, quantity=5)
print("Added fuel to furnace")

# Add iron ore to furnace
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=10)
print("Added iron ore to furnace")

# Place burner inserter next to furnace
inserter_pos = Position(x=furnace_pos.x - 1, y=furnace_pos.y)
move_to(inserter_pos)
inserter = place_entity(Prototype.BurnerInserter, position=inserter_pos)
print(f"Placed inserter at {inserter.position}")

# Add fuel to inserter
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, inserter, quantity=2)
print("Added fuel to inserter")

# Wait for smelting
print("Waiting for smelting...")
sleep(5)

# Check furnace contents
furnace_contents = inspect_inventory(furnace)
print(f"Furnace contents: {furnace_contents}")

# Extract any iron plates
if Prototype.IronPlate in furnace_contents:
    extract_item(Prototype.IronPlate, furnace.position, quantity=furnace_contents[Prototype.IronPlate])
    print("Extracted iron plates")

# Check our updated inventory
new_inventory = inspect_inventory()
print(f"Updated inventory: {new_inventory}")

"""
This should give us some iron plates which we can then use to craft the burner mining drill.
Once we have enough iron plates, we can proceed with crafting and placing the mining drill.
"""
